name: Happy fun minigolf fun times forever
name_original: Happy fun minigolf fun times forever
description:
Welcome to Happy fun mini golf fun times forever!

A short and ĉ̴̛͕̍u̷͚̾̌ṯ̶̨̓͠ĕ̵̮ minigolf with interesting and diverse levels created just for you!
Use mouse to aim, instructions on how to play will appear on screen.

Always follow the instructions and we can play f̸͙̮̩͛̆̍̀ȏ̸̱̬̹͒̊͝r̴̙͖̀͐͌̇ë̷̡̚v̵̦̹̮̰̫̦͛̔̽ẹ̶͓̮̯͚̒̈̓̈̑ṙ̶̢͙̺͊̓̋͝!

(on the web version there is a small load delay on some levels)
